Control Name: PERF 2.2 Understand the available compute conﬁguration options
Control Statement: Understand how various options complement your workload, and which conﬁguration options are best for your system. Examples of these options include instance family, sizes, features (GPU, I/O), function sizes, container instances, and single versus multi-tenancy.

control_attributes.Control: PERF 2.2 Understand the available compute conﬁguration options
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you select your compute solution?
